Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only serves its intended purpose but also adds a touch of elegance to your daily routine. Considering its unique features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this remarkable item at an exclusive price of $125. I trust this investment will provide you with years of satisfaction and utility. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
